channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 3x potholes - never repaired properly., 10th April
item.description:
Outside 41 Whittington road. These never get repaired properly. They open up within days again. The contractor is failing to do a proper job. Waste of tax payer money.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Whittington Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of fly tipping opposite the entrance to Colgate farm., 10th April
item.description:
Unable to stop and take a picture due to traffic. The fly tipping is what appears to be rubble and soil in bags, which also abstracts the road partially.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ham Road, Whittington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge and road destruction, on the road, blocked storm drains. 1/2 mile each way of Ham Hill farm., 10th April
item.description:
Damage has been caused by building work at Ham Hill Farm. Verges are being destroyed along with the road giving way and tarmac crumbling in places due to heavy plant vehicles, moving soil. No washing facilities within the building site to clean the wheels.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ham Road, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Traffic lights at the roundabout where A417 meets A40
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
